body: Iason, I don't think that the GH team build the panel to handle such long lists of values as an input.  In your situation, I would just use the native Grasshopper 'Read File' component to read in the csv values like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4bPQ8WfDNjUMgo1cDSa9*o4TrjQlQEU5ogVoXhEDebSOyMaKqJJQNybGjy**HSwGCIC0bbB38thLFyEyruQdez3BLC9pDEv/ParseCSV.JPG) Or you could use a specialized excel reader like that which comes with TTToolbox: [http://www.food4rhino.com/project/tttoolbox?ufh](http://www.food4rhino.com/project/tttoolbox?ufh) -Chris
